description: T1 - Silver Birch - Reduce crown to previous points of reduction (1-2m branch removal), remove low stem at right side & small branch overlawn.Oak - T2 - Remove small diameter low branch growing over shed door - see photoReasons: routine maintenance work, and in accordance with good arboricultural practise. Prevent nuisance and obstruction from trees
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
